description:
Honda Chiaki is Gorou`s biological mother who passed away when Gorou was three years old.
Her death hits both Shigeharu and Gorou hard; however, Shigeharu manages to pull himself together and proceeds to raise Gorou by himself until he meets Hoshino Momoko, Gorou`s kindergarten teacher, who bears a striking resemblance with the late Chiaki.
name: Honda Chiaki
